title: ISic000986. Funerary inscription of Auxanon

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • text as per Crispi, Kaibel in IG, Orsi (Kaibel omits the second hedera in line 1)

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Tomb of Sabinos, in this lies Auxanon, son of this man, having lived 25 years

commentary

One of several inscriptions described by Crispi as coming from Taormina but commonly attributed to Siracusa.
